title: Student Dormitory Allocation
description: Led a cross-functional team to implement a custom dorm room assignment algorithm using Python to prioritize affordability and accessibility for over 2,000 students across 300 dorm rooms.

title: Redistricting and Gerrymandering New Jersey Congressional Map
description: Led the development of a redistricting algorithm using Python to create fair congressional maps, handling TIGER shape data with over 100,000 rows of precinct-level population data.

title: Twitter Data Analysis
description: Conducted sentiment analysis on public figure tweets using Python, Pandas, and the VADER lexicon, analyzing trends and public perception across 10,000+ tweets.
